wikipedia_page.main: Barclay James Littlewood (born 1978 in Huddersfield) is a British entrepreneur who founded Ukessays.com, a commercial writing service which sells essays and other academic work. The work is sold over the internet to students in the UK, the US and Western Europe. Despite criticism about the fact that students represent the work as their own, the company maintains copyright in all their work and they claim that the essays they sell are to be used as a study guide.
